title: Two New Xbox Games Leaked, And They're Taking Risks -- Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.11.21
description:
Head to https://bit.ly/SMT5Daily or the Nintendo eShop to check out Shin Megami Tensei 5!

Go to http://creditkarma.com/loanoffers to find the loan for you!

Go to http://buyraycon.com/kfgd to get 20% off your Raycons!

Arcane is now streaming exclusively on Netflix!

Tim and Tam discuss two unannounced Xbox games that have been leaked, Steam Deck Delays, Naruto coming to Fortnite, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:56 - Housekeeping
ELDEN RING: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dEGzxPS3c5k
The Roper Report   -
00:11:44 - Spider-Man in Avengers
00:13:28 - Steam Deck and Playdate Delayed To 2022
00:16:45 - Naruto Coming To Fortnite
00:23:58 - The Game Awards 2021 Will Have 40-50 Games
00:29:10 - Ads
00:33:06 - New upcoming Xbox exclusives revealed:
00:38:07 - “Do you expect Obsidian to pull off a really interesting concept that sounds to rival The Forgotten City and Disco Elysium in depth when it sounds like its a small team like Grounded?” - The Nano Biologist
00:45:07 - Call of Duty: Vanguard leaks hint at Captain America & Indiana Jones
00:51:18 - Out today
00:53:30 - NVIDIA GeForce Update
00:56:06 - You‘re Wrong
00:58:30 - Post Show
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing & Janet
